entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vaughan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:44 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few showers. High 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few showers beginning early in the morning and ending in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 70 in the morning. High 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 2.
